name: EventNative
description: The easiest event capturing in the world. Read more about Heroku Deploy: https://eventnative-docs.ksense.io/deployment/deploy-on-heroku

SERVER_AUTH.description: API secret token. Use any random string without whitespaces and save it. Later on you'll need it for JavaScript snippet

GEO_MAXMIND_PATH.description: Http url to hosted MaxMind db file if you want to enable geo resolution (leave emply otherwise). Read more about geo: https://eventnative-docs.ksense.io/geo-data-resolution

DESTINATIONS_JSON.description: JSON config for destination. Please, check suggested documentation here: https://eventnative-docs.ksense.io/deployment/deploy-on-heroku
